entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Dawson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:27 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Dawson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
